title: HR / Business Manager Job at Aeroport Travels and Tours Limited (ATTL)
content:
Aeroport Travels and Tours Ltd is a full fledged travel management company located in Lagos, Nigeria. At ATTL, we strive to provide our customers with the very best service in the industry today

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: HR / Business Manager

Job Location: Oshodi / Ajao Estate, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The HR/Business Manager will play a crucial role in ensuring the smooth functioning of the organization, including financial management, organizational development, performance management, compensation and benefits and employee relations.


Key Responsibilties
Financial Management:


	Manage the company's finances, including budgeting, accounting, and financial reporting.
	Develop and implement financial policies and procedures to ensure compliance and transparency.
	Work closely with the Business Development teamto oversee revenue generation, meeting and exceeding sales targets.
	Monitor expenses, analyze financial data, and provide regular reports to the MD/CEO.


Organizational Development:


	Oversee day-to-day operations and administrative functions of the company.
	Implement policies and procedures to optimize efficiency and productivity.
	Foster a positive and inclusive work environment that promotes teamwork and collaboration.


Recruitment and Staffing:


	Identify staffing needs in different departments
	Develop Job descriptions and post job vacancies
	Conduct interviews and select qualified candidates
	Oversee the onboarding process for new employees.


Collaboration:


	Work closely with department heads and management to align HR strategies with business objectives
	Serve as intermediary between the CEO and department heads.


Performance Management:


	Implement performance appraisal systems and set performance goals
	Provide feedback and coaching to employees for continuous improvement
	Proactively identify talent gaps and make plans to overcome them.


Compensation And Benefits:


	Manage payroll, including processing wages and addressing payroll inquiries
	Administer employee benefits, such as healthcare
	Oversee pay distributions to employees.


Employee Relations:


	Foster a positive workplace culture that promotes employee satisfaction and retention
	Address employee concerns and grievances effectively
	Promote open communication channels within the organization.


Requirements


	Minimum of a Bachelor's Degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, Management, Finance, or related fields with 4 - 5 years work experience
	Strong financial management skills, including budgeting, financial analysis, and reporting.
	Excellent leadership abilities with a track record of building and leading high-performing teams.
	Strategic thinker with the ability to develop and execute effective plans and initiatives.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to engage diverse stakeholders.


Salary
N300,000 - N350,000 monthly. 

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: jobs@aeroporttravels.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Administrative Officer I Job at University of Nigeria, Nsukka (UNN)
content:
The University of Nigeria, commonly referred to as UNN, is a federal university located in Nsukka, Enugu State, Eastern part of Nigeria. Founded by Nnamdi Azikiwe in 1955 and formally opened on 7 October 1960, the University of Nigeria has three campuses in Enugu State– Nsukka, Enugu, and Ituku-Ozalla.

The University of Nigeria is the first full-fledged indigenous and first autonomous university in Nigeria, modelled upon the American educational system. It was the first land-grant university in Africa and one of the five most reputed universities in Nigeria. The university has 17 Faculties and 102 academic departments. The university offers 108 undergraduate programs and 211 postgraduate programmes.
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Applications are invited from suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Officer I - CONTISS 8

Job Ref.: UNP/SSR.37/06/25
Job Location: Nsukka, Enugu

Requirements


	Candidates should possess a good Honours Degree of not below Second-class Lower Division (2') plus minimum three (3) years post qualification cognate experience in University.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should submit 25 (Twenty-Five) copies of their Application, accompanied with a detailed Curriculum Vitae and copies of each certificate claimed, giving the following details in STRICT ORDER:


	Full Name with surname first
	Post Desired
	Date and Place of Birth
	Permanent Home Address
	Contact Address
	Phone No. and Email Address
	Sex
	Local Government and State of Origin
	Age
	Nationality
	Marital Status
	Number and ages of Children (if any)
	Educational Institutions attended with dates
	Academic and Professional qualifications obtained with dates
	Working experience
	List of Publications (if any), with relevant details
	Evidence of Community Services
	Present Employer
	Status and salary
	Extra-Curricular activities
	Addresses of three(3) referees.


All applications, together with Referee reports and NYSC certificate or exemption, are to be submitted under confidential cover marked "Administrative Officer I" to:
The Registrar,
University of Nigeria, Nsukka (UNN),
Nsukka, Enugu State.

Electronic copies of the application should be sent to: personnel.unn@unn.edu.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email

Note: Applications not received by the time and date stated above will not be accepted.

title: Personal Assistant Job at ODYSSEY HR Solutions
content:
ODYSSEY HR Solutions is an independentHuman Resources (HR) consulting firm with focus on ‘People Management’ in organisations. We help oversee all HR-related aspects of an organisation using strategic HR Best-Practices and adhere to current employment laws geared towards enhancing organisational performance. Odyssey HR Solutions is duly registered with the Corporate Affairs Commission of Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Personal Assistant
Job Location: Ajah, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Schedule and Calendar Management
	Draft, edit, and manage correspondence with accuracy and in line with the organisation’s objectives
	Liaise with both internal and external stakeholders to maintain effective communication at all times
	Prepare excellent presentations, reports, and briefing documents for meetings and events
	Conduct research and compile data towards the support of decision-making in the organisation
	Oversee cash flow management ensuring proper documentation and accountability
	Maintain records, reports, and documentation related to all office activities
	Lipase with event organizers, protocol officers and other stakeholders for seamless execution of events
	Participate in meetings and provide administrative support, including minute-takings and follow ups to ensure actions from the meetings are implemented appropriately


Qualification


	Education: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Public Administration, Communications or any related field
	Experience: 5-7years in an administrative role in an environmental sustainability, or corporate setting


Skills:


	Excellent organizational and time management skills
	Verbal and written communication abilities
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)
	Financial management skills: Petty cashflow management and documentation
	Briefing and Presentations Skills
	Discretion and confidentiality.


 

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted in this process.

title: Business Development Executive Job at Aureole Consulting Limited
content:
Aureole Consulting Limited is an HR consulting company which specialize in talent acquisition services, Outsourcing Services, Executive Search, Social Media Job Advertisement, HR consulting amongst other services. Our aim is to revolutionize HR consulting in Africa.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Executive

Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a result-driven and dynamic Business Development Executive to help grow our business by identifying new opportunities, building and nurturing client relationships, and contributing to our overall growth strategy.
	This role goes beyond traditional business development, requiring a strong grasp of digital marketing tools and strategies to generate leads, enhance brand visibility, and support targeted sales efforts in a data-driven manner.


Key Responsibilities


	Identify and develop new business opportunities across relevant markets.
	Build and maintain strong relationships with potential clients.
	Present our range of services to prospective clients.
	Conduct market research and analyze competitor activity to find opportunities.
	Manage the sales pipeline via CRM tools and prepare proposals and presentations.
	Collaborate with internal teams to align objectives and deliver value.
	Utilize digital marketing strategies (Google Ads, Facebook Ads, SEO) to support lead generation.
	Represent the company at client meetings, industry events, and networking opportunities.


Qualifications


	Bachelor's Degree in Business, Marketing, Real Estate, or a related field.
	3+ years of experience in business development, sales, or client relationship management, ideally in the construction or real estate sector.
	Solid understanding of digital marketing (social media, email campaigns, online ads,
	basic SEO).
	Proven ability to generate leads and close deals through both traditional and digital channels.
	Strong communication, negotiation, and presentation skills.
	Proficient with CRM tools, Microsoft Office, and marketing platforms like Mailchimp, Meta Ads Manager, and Google Ads.
	Knowledge of real estate regulations, land acquisition, or construction processes is a plus.


Salary
N200,000 - N250,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@aureole.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
